p: The objective average change in the graph was 0.01, and participants in both conditions over-estimated the average value change (mean estimated change = 0.52 in the temperature condition, mean estimated change = 0.43 in the neutral condition, p < 0.001). Participants in the temperature condition estimated the change as numerically larger than those in the neutral condition [ t(205) = 1.49, p = 0.14, d = 0.20].
